recipe.name: Creme Brulee
recipe.preparation: Heat half & half in double boiler until hot but not boiling.  Beat egg yolks, sugar and salt and gradually add hot half & half.  Put mixture into baking dish and put into preheated oven at 350F and bake until set.  Test like custard.  Put in refrigerator until cool.  Sprinkle a thin layer of brown sugar on top and put under the broiler  Let brown sugar melt.  Watch closely or it will burn.Take 2 boxes of fresh strawberries. Mix 1 tablespoon of honey, and 2 Tablespoons of Kirsch and serve with creme brulee, or can be served with canned green gage plums.
